trans-unit.source: Don't allow if number of consecutive leave days exceed
trans-unit.target: Ne pas autoriser si le nombre de jours de congé consécutifs dépasse
trans-unit.note: The administrator can set this apply restriction to restrict employees from applying for this leave if the leave request is for a specific number of consecutive days defined.

trans-unit.source: Don't allow if Service Period is less than
trans-unit.target: Refuser autorisation si Période de Service est inférieure à
trans-unit.note: The administrator can set this apply restriction to restrict employees from applying for this leave if they have only worked for the organization outside the service period restriction defined.

trans-unit.source: Don't allow more than current leave net balance. Net Balance = [Total Entitlements] - [Leave Taken + Leave Scheduled + Leave Pending Approval]
trans-unit.target: L'autorisation ne peut excéder le solde net de congés. Solde net = [Total des autorisations] - [Congés pris + Congés prévus + Congés en attente d'approbation]
trans-unit.note: The administrator can set this apply restriction for the following leave type and restrict employee from applying for more than the current leave net balance.

trans-unit.source: Don't allow more than leave balance.
trans-unit.target: Ne pas autoriser au-delà du solde de congés.
trans-unit.note: The administrator can set this apply restriction for the following leave type and restrict employee from applying for more than the leave balance.
